Text: Re Thank You Cc Kaminski I can stop by any Thursday or Friday to meet Grant I think that will be great for me to understand better what you are doing in your group and I will be doing this summer Could you let me know which day would work for you please Sevil Yaman Department of Economics University of Houston Houston TX On Thu Feb wrote Sevil We are looking forward to having you here If you want you can stop by one day and I shall introduce you to Grant Masson with whom you will be working this summer Vince Sevil Yaman ayouUHEDU on AM To cc Subject Thank You Hi Dr Kaminski Yesterday I learned from Shannon Rogers at the associateanalyst program that I was offered a summer associateinternship position in your group I am already very excited about this position and look forward to working in your group Many thanks for your consideration Sevil Yaman Department of Economics University of Houston Houston TX
